subject: Marathon Running
Weather
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Evans Cheruiyot of Kenya proved the fastest on Sunday, winning in 2 hours 6 minutes 25 seconds, and Lidiya Grigoryeva of Russia won the women’s race in 2:27:17.
snippet: Evans Cheruiyot of Kenya proved the fastest on Sunday, winning in 2 hours 6 minutes 25 seconds, and Lidiya Grigoryeva of Russia won the women’s race in 2:27:17.
